name: Meal Prepper
description: This application is designed to simplify meal planning. It lets the user search for new recipes in a cuisine of their choice, and gives them a calendar view of when to cook these recipes.

name: Kindler
description: Kindler is a mobile application built using React Native, and developed by a team of 3. The goal of this application is to provide individuals and those in relationships with planning tools to empower them during the decision making process of planning a date.

name: Atlantic Tech News Scraper
description: This application is designed to simplify meal planning. It lets the user search for new recipes in a cuisine of their choice, and gives them a calendar view of when to cook these recipes.

name: React Memory Game
description: Memory game where user is shown a number of pictures and must click on each unique picture with no repeats. Pictures shuffle randomly on each click. Developed in React.js.

name: Storefront CLI
description: CLI app with two primary interfaces, one for customers and one for managers. Meant to simulate an online storefront. Built using Node.js, with all data stored in MySQL database.

name: Compatibility Quiz
description: A quiz that contains a variety of questions that the user can answer. Based on answers, user is matched with another user with the most similar answers.
